desc.en: In order to read the G.BIBLE, the Game Development Department needs to decrypt the password. To do so, they reach out to Veritas. Maki tells them they'll need the Mirror that was confiscated by the Student Council. To retrieve it, they'll need to get into the contraband storage guarded by the Maid Club.
desc.jp: In order to read the G.BIBLE, the Game Development Department needs to decrypt the password. To do so, they reach out to Veritas. Maki tells them they'll need the Mirror that was confiscated by the Student Council. To retrieve it, they'll need to get into the contraband storage guarded by the Maid Club.
desc.thai: In order to read the G.BIBLE, the Game Development Department needs to decrypt the password. To do so, they reach out to Veritas. Maki tells them they'll need the Mirror that was confiscated by the Student Council. To retrieve it, they'll need to get into the contraband storage guarded by the Maid Club.
desc.ko: In order to read the G.BIBLE, the Game Development Department needs to decrypt the password. To do so, they reach out to Veritas. Maki tells them they'll need the Mirror that was confiscated by the Student Council. To retrieve it, they'll need to get into the contraband storage guarded by the Maid Club.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部為了解讀暗號閱覽<G.Bible>而向<貝里塔斯>諮詢。真紀回答說，如果想解讀暗號，需要有被學生會扣押的駭客工具<鏡子>。一行人為了拿回<鏡子>，便前往由女僕部看守的學生會扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部为了解读暗号阅览<G.Bible>而向<贝里塔斯>咨询。真纪回答说，如果想解读暗号，需要有被学生会扣押的骇客工具<镜子>。一行人为了拿回<镜子>，便前往由女仆部看守的学生会扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部为了解读暗号阅览<G.Bible>而向<贝里塔斯>咨询。真纪回答说，如果想解读暗号，需要有被学生会扣押的骇客工具<镜子>。一行人为了拿回<镜子>，便前往由女仆部看守的学生会扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部为了解读暗号阅览<G.Bible>而向<贝里塔斯>咨询。真纪回答说，如果想解读暗号，需要有被学生会扣押的骇客工具<镜子>。一行人为了拿回<镜子>，便前往由女仆部看守的学生会扣押品保管所。

desc.en: Hare from Veritas brought a bad news to everyone: Momoi's game saves could not be recovered. Momoi cried out after hearing this. Maki, by analyzing the file's metadata, confirmed its genuity, but was unable to crack the password.
desc.jp: Hare from Veritas brought a bad news to everyone: Momoi's game saves could not be recovered. Momoi cried out after hearing this. Maki, by analyzing the file's metadata, confirmed its genuity, but was unable to crack the password.
desc.thai: Hare from Veritas brought a bad news to everyone: Momoi's game saves could not be recovered. Momoi cried out after hearing this. Maki, by analyzing the file's metadata, confirmed its genuity, but was unable to crack the password.
desc.ko: Hare from Veritas brought a bad news to everyone: Momoi's game saves could not be recovered. Momoi cried out after hearing this. Maki, by analyzing the file's metadata, confirmed its genuity, but was unable to crack the password.
desc.zh_tw: 貝里塔斯的晴首先為大家帶來了壞消息：桃井的遊戲存檔不可恢復，桃井聽到立刻哭了起來。不過，真紀通過分析文件元數據，確認了文件的真實性，但卻無法破解密碼。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 贝里塔斯的晴首先为大家带来了坏消息：桃井的游戏存档不可恢复，桃井听到立刻哭了起来。不过，真纪通过分析文件元数据，确认了文件的真实性，但却无法破解密码。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 贝里塔斯的晴首先为大家带来了坏消息：桃井的游戏存档不可恢复，桃井听到立刻哭了起来。不过，真纪通过分析文件元数据，确认了文件的真实性，但却无法破解密码。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 贝里塔斯的晴首先为大家带来了坏消息：桃井的游戏存档不可恢复，桃井听到立刻哭了起来。不过，真纪通过分析文件元数据，确认了文件的真实性，但却无法破解密码。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.thai: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.ko: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。
desc.zh_tw: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.

desc.en: For Maki's reference, she thought that it is possible if they were just extracting the encrypted files rather than cracking the password. Yet a tool specifically designed to do so, called "Mirror", was confiscated by the Seminar recently. As a tool created by the president, Veritas intended to retrieve it back, which made an unexpected collision with the GDD. As a result, they purposed to raid Millennium's Seminar.
desc.jp: For Maki's reference, she thought that it is possible if they were just extracting the encrypted files rather than cracking the password. Yet a tool specifically designed to do so, called "Mirror", was confiscated by the Seminar recently. As a tool created by the president, Veritas intended to retrieve it back, which made an unexpected collision with the GDD. As a result, they purposed to raid Millennium's Seminar.
desc.thai: For Maki's reference, she thought that it is possible if they were just extracting the encrypted files rather than cracking the password. Yet a tool specifically designed to do so, called "Mirror", was confiscated by the Seminar recently. As a tool created by the president, Veritas intended to retrieve it back, which made an unexpected collision with the GDD. As a result, they purposed to raid Millennium's Seminar.
desc.ko: For Maki's reference, she thought that it is possible if they were just extracting the encrypted files rather than cracking the password. Yet a tool specifically designed to do so, called "Mirror", was confiscated by the Seminar recently. As a tool created by the president, Veritas intended to retrieve it back, which made an unexpected collision with the GDD. As a result, they purposed to raid Millennium's Seminar.
desc.zh_tw: 真紀認為，如果能直接提取出加密文件而不是破解密碼，應該還能行得通。然而一款正是照此設計的工具“鏡子”卻被學生會沒收。因為是部長製作的工具，貝里塔斯也打算將其取回——這與開發部眾人不謀而合，於是他們便提出要突襲千年學生會。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 真纪认为，如果能直接提取出加密文件而不是破解密码，应该还能行得通。然而一款正是照此设计的工具“镜子”却被学生会没收。因为是部长制作的工具，贝里塔斯也打算将其取回——这与开发部众人不谋而合，于是他们便提出要突袭千年学生会。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 真纪认为，如果能直接提取出加密文件而不是破解密码，应该还能行得通。然而一款正是照此设计的工具“镜子”却被学生会没收。因为是部长制作的工具，贝里塔斯也打算将其取回——这与开发部众人不谋而合，于是他们便提出要突袭千年学生会。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 真纪认为，如果能直接提取出加密文件而不是破解密码，应该还能行得通。然而一款正是照此设计的工具“镜子”却被学生会没收。因为是部长制作的工具，贝里塔斯也打算将其取回——这与开发部众人不谋而合，于是他们便提出要突袭千年学生会。

desc.en: Yuuka got the intel of Game Development Department planning to raid Seminar with Veritas, and so she asked assistance from Akane of C&C.
desc.jp: Yuuka got the intel of Game Development Department planning to raid Seminar with Veritas, and so she asked assistance from Akane of C&C.
desc.thai: Yuuka got the intel of Game Development Department planning to raid Seminar with Veritas, and so she asked assistance from Akane of C&C.
desc.ko: Yuuka got the intel of Game Development Department planning to raid Seminar with Veritas, and so she asked assistance from Akane of C&C.
desc.zh_tw: 優香知悉了遊戲開發部要聯合貝里塔斯突襲千年學生會的事情，於是向C&C的朱音請求援助。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香知悉了游戏开发部要联合贝里塔斯突袭千年学生会的事情，于是向C&C的茜请求援助。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香知悉了游戏开发部要联合贝里塔斯突袭千年学生会的事情，于是向C&C的朱音请求援助。

desc.en: Maki explained the current situation to GDD: the Mirror was stored at the Contraband Room of Seminar's, where C&C is the one who guards it. Momoi immediately decided to retreat, but Kotama said that she know some intel about C&C.
desc.jp: Maki explained the current situation to GDD: the Mirror was stored at the Contraband Room of Seminar's, where C&C is the one who guards it. Momoi immediately decided to retreat, but Kotama said that she know some intel about C&C.

desc.zh_tw: 真紀向開發部解釋了現狀：“鏡子”被保存在學生會的“扣押品保管所”中，而C&C負責看守那裡。桃井聽後立刻決定撤退，但小玉突然說自己知道C&C的一些消息。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 真纪向开发部解释了现状：“镜子”被保存在学生会的“扣押品保管所”中，而C&C负责看守那里。桃井听后立刻决定撤退，但小玉突然说自己知道C&C的一些消息。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 真纪向开发部解释了现状：“镜子”被保存在学生会的“扣押品保管所”中，而C&C负责看守那里。桃井听后立刻决定撤退，但小玉突然说自己知道C&C的一些消息。

desc.en: Kotama mentioned that, currently, the president and the real girl Neru was absent, and therefore they had a chance to head-to-head with C&C.
desc.jp: Kotama mentioned that, currently, the president and the real girl Neru was absent, and therefore they had a chance to head-to-head with C&C.
desc.thai: Kotama mentioned that, currently, the president and the real girl Neru was absent, and therefore they had a chance to head-to-head with C&C.
desc.ko: Kotama mentioned that, currently, the president and the real girl Neru was absent, and therefore they had a chance to head-to-head with C&C.
desc.zh_tw: 小玉提到，目前C&C的部長、戰鬥力擔當“寧瑠”暫時不在，由此他們有機會對峙C&C。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 小玉提到，目前C&C的部长、战斗力担当“尼禄”暂时不在，由此他们有机会对峙C&C。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 小玉提到，目前C&C的部长、战斗力担当“宁瑠”暂时不在，由此他们有机会对峙C&C。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 小玉提到，目前C&C的部长、战斗力担当“宁瑠”暂时不在，由此他们有机会对峙C&C。

desc.en: Knowing the Neru was absent, Yuuka was shocked. Yet Akane promised her that C&C would eventually nail it.
desc.jp: Knowing the Neru was absent, Yuuka was shocked. Yet Akane promised her that C&C would eventually nail it.
desc.thai: Knowing the Neru was absent, Yuuka was shocked. Yet Akane promised her that C&C would eventually nail it.
desc.ko: Knowing the Neru was absent, Yuuka was shocked. Yet Akane promised her that C&C would eventually nail it.
desc.zh_tw: 優香得知寧瑠不在，大為震撼。然而朱音向她保證C&C絕對能夠辦到。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香得知尼禄不在，大为震撼。然而茜向她保证C&C绝对能够办到。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香得知宁瑠不在，大为震撼。然而朱音向她保证C&C绝对能够办到。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 优香得知宁瑠不在，大为震撼。然而朱音向她保证C&C绝对能够办到。

school.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Momoi still held her concern on whether participating or not, but Midori had already decided it: the GDD is an important place for everyone to gather and laugh, and she wanted to protect all of this. Having played more than 40 RPG games, Aris concluded that it's nothing more important than friends alongside in an adventure. Hare appreciated that and asked Sensei to let the Engineering Department join them as well.
desc.jp: Momoi still held her concern on whether participating or not, but Midori had already decided it: the GDD is an important place for everyone to gather and laugh, and she wanted to protect all of this. Having played more than 40 RPG games, Aris concluded that it's nothing more important than friends alongside in an adventure. Hare appreciated that and asked Sensei to let the Engineering Department join them as well.
desc.thai: Momoi still held her concern on whether participating or not, but Midori had already decided it: the GDD is an important place for everyone to gather and laugh, and she wanted to protect all of this. Having played more than 40 RPG games, Aris concluded that it's nothing more important than friends alongside in an adventure. Hare appreciated that and asked Sensei to let the Engineering Department join them as well.
desc.ko: Momoi still held her concern on whether participating or not, but Midori had already decided it: the GDD is an important place for everyone to gather and laugh, and she wanted to protect all of this. Having played more than 40 RPG games, Aris concluded that it's nothing more important than friends alongside in an adventure. Hare appreciated that and asked Sensei to let the Engineering Department join them as well.
desc.zh_tw: 桃井還對是否參與有所顧忌，但綠已經決定：遊戲開發部，是大家在一起的重要地方，她想要保護這一切。愛麗絲從玩過的四十多款RPG中得出結論，冒險路上最重要的是同行的伙伴。晴表示同意，並希望老師能夠去找工程師部一起行動。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井还对是否参与有所顾忌，但绿已经决定：游戏开发部，是大家在一起的重要地方，她想要保护这一切。爱丽丝从玩过的四十多款RPG中得出结论，冒险路上最重要的是同行的伙伴。晴表示同意，并希望老师能够去找工程师部一起行动。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井还对是否参与有所顾忌，但绿已经决定：游戏开发部，是大家在一起的重要地方，她想要保护这一切。爱丽丝从玩过的四十多款RPG中得出结论，冒险路上最重要的是同行的伙伴。晴表示同意，并希望老师能够去找工程师部一起行动。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃井还对是否参与有所顾忌，但绿已经决定：游戏开发部，是大家在一起的重要地方，她想要保护这一切。爱丽丝从玩过的四十多款RPG中得出结论，冒险路上最重要的是同行的伙伴。晴表示同意，并希望老师能够去找工程师部一起行动。

desc.en: Akane was curious about the source of the intel, and Yuuka replied to her with a catty smile: Himari, the president of Veritas, told her directly.
desc.jp: Akane was curious about the source of the intel, and Yuuka replied to her with a catty smile: Himari, the president of Veritas, told her directly.

desc.zh_tw: 朱音好奇優香從何得知的消息，優香則狡猾地笑著表示，是貝里塔斯的部長陽葵告訴她的。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 茜好奇优香从何得知的消息，优香则狡猾地笑着表示，是贝里塔斯的部长日鞠告诉她的。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 朱音好奇优香从何得知的消息，优香则狡猾地笑着表示，是贝里塔斯的部长阳葵告诉她的。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 朱音好奇优香从何得知的消息，优香则狡猾地笑着表示，是贝里塔斯的部长阳葵告诉她的。

desc.en: 游戏开发部学生为了取得能让爱丽丝使用的枪支,便前往 千年学园的<工程师部>。爱丽丝在那里选择了宇宙战舰用的轨道炮。工程师部为了测试她的能力而向她挑战。
desc.jp: 游戏开发部学生为了取得能让爱丽丝使用的枪支,便前往 千年学园的<工程师部>。爱丽丝在那里选择了宇宙战舰用的轨道炮。工程师部为了测试她的能力而向她挑战。

desc.en: Aris skillfully uses the railgun to fend off the Engineering Department members, despite never having held such a weapon before. Utaha, the president of the Engineering Department, begins to become suspicious of Aris' unusual physical prowess.
desc.jp: Aris skillfully uses the railgun to fend off the Engineering Department members, despite never having held such a weapon before. Utaha, the president of the Engineering Department, begins to become suspicious of Aris' unusual physical prowess.
desc.thai: Aris skillfully uses the railgun to fend off the Engineering Department members, despite never having held such a weapon before. Utaha, the president of the Engineering Department, begins to become suspicious of Aris' unusual physical prowess.
desc.ko: Aris skillfully uses the railgun to fend off the Engineering Department members, despite never having held such a weapon before. Utaha, the president of the Engineering Department, begins to become suspicious of Aris' unusual physical prowess.
desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲熟練地使用從沒碰過的軌道砲，壓制了工程師部。工程師部的部長詠葉見狀，便害怕起愛麗絲卓越的身體素質。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝熟练地使用从没碰过的轨道炮,压制了工程师部。工程师部的部长歌原见状，便害怕起爱丽丝卓越的身体素质。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝熟练地使用从没碰过的轨道炮,压制了工程师部。工程师部的部长咏叶见状，便害怕起爱丽丝卓越的身体素质。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝熟练地使用从没碰过的轨道炮,压制了工程师部。工程师部的部长咏叶见状，便害怕起爱丽丝卓越的身体素质。

desc.ko: All of the Game Development Club went to the Engineering Department with Aris.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部一行人帶著愛麗絲去到了工程師部。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人带着爱丽丝去到了工程师部。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部一行人带着爱丽丝去到了工程师部。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部一行人带着爱丽丝去到了工程师部。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.thai: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.ko: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。
desc.zh_tw: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.

desc.en: Utaha and others welcomed them, and Hibiki took the initiative to choose weapons for Aris. But Aris soon put her attention onto a railgun, which was them introduced by Kotori. She mentioned that the development was terminated due to funding issues. All of the Engineering Department thought Aris couldn't lift it up, but Aris had not only lifted it, but also left a hole on the club room; as a last resort, the Engineering Department challenged the Game Development Club, who can take it away if they won them.
desc.jp: Utaha and others welcomed them, and Hibiki took the initiative to choose weapons for Aris. But Aris soon put her attention onto a railgun, which was them introduced by Kotori. She mentioned that the development was terminated due to funding issues. All of the Engineering Department thought Aris couldn't lift it up, but Aris had not only lifted it, but also left a hole on the club room; as a last resort, the Engineering Department challenged the Game Development Club, who can take it away if they won them.
desc.thai: Utaha and others welcomed them, and Hibiki took the initiative to choose weapons for Aris. But Aris soon put her attention onto a railgun, which was them introduced by Kotori. She mentioned that the development was terminated due to funding issues. All of the Engineering Department thought Aris couldn't lift it up, but Aris had not only lifted it, but also left a hole on the club room; as a last resort, the Engineering Department challenged the Game Development Club, who can take it away if they won them.
desc.ko: Utaha and others welcomed them, and Hibiki took the initiative to choose weapons for Aris. But Aris soon put her attention onto a railgun, which was them introduced by Kotori. She mentioned that the development was terminated due to funding issues. All of the Engineering Department thought Aris couldn't lift it up, but Aris had not only lifted it, but also left a hole on the club room; as a last resort, the Engineering Department challenged the Game Development Club, who can take it away if they won them.
desc.zh_tw: 詠葉等工程師部的學生歡迎了開發部一行人。響主動提出要為愛麗絲找武器，但愛麗絲很快把注意力放到了一門軌道炮上。亞都梨主動為愛麗絲介紹了這門傑作，提到由於資金問題這門大砲的研發已經終止。工程師部眾人本以為愛麗絲無法舉起它，但後者不僅拿起了它，還不小心給房頂開了個洞；不得已，工程師部決定測試遊戲開發部眾人的能力，達標後才能拿走。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 歌原等工程师部的学生欢迎了开发部一行人。响主动提出要为爱丽丝找武器，但爱丽丝很快把注意力放到了一门轨道炮上。柯托莉主动为爱丽丝介绍了这门杰作，提到由于资金问题这门大炮的研发已经终止。工程师部众人本以为爱丽丝无法举起它，但后者不仅拿起了它，还不小心给房顶开了个洞；不得已，工程师部决定测试游戏开发部众人的能力，达标后才能拿走。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 咏叶等工程师部的学生欢迎了开发部一行人。响主动提出要为爱丽丝找武器，但爱丽丝很快把注意力放到了一门轨道炮上。亚都梨主动为爱丽丝介绍了这门杰作，提到由于资金问题这门大炮的研发已经终止。工程师部众人本以为爱丽丝无法举起它，但后者不仅拿起了它，还不小心给房顶开了个洞；不得已，工程师部决定测试游戏开发部众人的能力，达标后才能拿走。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 咏叶等工程师部的学生欢迎了开发部一行人。响主动提出要为爱丽丝找武器，但爱丽丝很快把注意力放到了一门轨道炮上。亚都梨主动为爱丽丝介绍了这门杰作，提到由于资金问题这门大炮的研发已经终止。工程师部众人本以为爱丽丝无法举起它，但后者不仅拿起了它，还不小心给房顶开了个洞；不得已，工程师部决定测试游戏开发部众人的能力，达标后才能拿走。

desc.en: Hibiki continued adjusting for Aris, yet Utaha noticed that Aris was in fact a machine and was worried for her abilities.
desc.jp: Hibiki continued adjusting for Aris, yet Utaha noticed that Aris was in fact a machine and was worried for her abilities.
desc.thai: Hibiki continued adjusting for Aris, yet Utaha noticed that Aris was in fact a machine and was worried for her abilities.
desc.ko: Hibiki continued adjusting for Aris, yet Utaha noticed that Aris was in fact a machine and was worried for her abilities.
desc.zh_tw: 響繼續為愛麗絲的使用進行著一些調整，而詠葉察覺到，愛麗絲似乎實際上是一具機械，並對她所具有的能力感到擔心。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 响继续为爱丽丝的使用进行着一些调整，而歌原察觉到，爱丽丝似乎实际上是一具机械，并对她所具有的能力感到担心。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 响继续为爱丽丝的使用进行着一些调整，而咏叶察觉到，爱丽丝似乎实际上是一具机械，并对她所具有的能力感到担心。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 响继续为爱丽丝的使用进行着一些调整，而咏叶察觉到，爱丽丝似乎实际上是一具机械，并对她所具有的能力感到担心。

desc.en: The situation is finally resolved. Rio vanishes, the C&C welcomes a new member, and the Game Development Department resumes development of their new project. Peace returns to Millennium.
desc.jp: The situation is finally resolved. Rio vanishes, the C&C welcomes a new member, and the Game Development Department resumes development of their new project. Peace returns to Millennium.
desc.thai: The situation is finally resolved. Rio vanishes, the C&C welcomes a new member, and the Game Development Department resumes development of their new project. Peace returns to Millennium.
desc.ko: The situation is finally resolved. Rio vanishes, the C&C welcomes a new member, and the Game Development Department resumes development of their new project. Peace returns to Millennium.
desc.zh_tw: 事情告一段落。莉央消失不見，C&C則迎接新成員，遊戲開發部再次開始研發下一部作品。千年再次恢復和平的日常生活。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 事情告一段落。莉央消失不见，C&C则迎接新成员，游戏开发部再次开始研发下一部作品。千年再次恢复和平的日常生活。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 事情告一段落。莉央消失不见，C&C则迎接新成员，游戏开发部再次开始研发下一部作品。千年再次恢复和平的日常生活。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 事情告一段落。莉央消失不见，C&C则迎接新成员，游戏开发部再次开始研发下一部作品。千年再次恢复和平的日常生活。

desc.en: Himari said that the Eridu City had been sealed and the things afterwards would be handled by her.
desc.jp: Himari said that the Eridu City had been sealed and the things afterwards would be handled by her.
desc.thai: Himari said that the Eridu City had been sealed and the things afterwards would be handled by her.
desc.ko: Himari said that the Eridu City had been sealed and the things afterwards would be handled by her.
desc.zh_tw: 陽葵向老師表示，Eridu已經封存，後事將由她進行負責。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠向老师表示，Eridu已经封存，后事将由她进行负责。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阳葵向老师表示，Eridu已经封存，后事将由她进行负责。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 阳葵向老师表示，Eridu已经封存，后事将由她进行负责。

hobby.zh_cn_tw: 确认今天的运势、所有的神秘事物

desc.en: Rio decided to step down as the president after this incident. Though in great shock, Yuuka could only find a note left by the President, with "I'm sorry" on it.
desc.jp: Rio decided to step down as the president after this incident. Though in great shock, Yuuka could only find a note left by the President, with "I'm sorry" on it.
desc.thai: Rio decided to step down as the president after this incident. Though in great shock, Yuuka could only find a note left by the President, with "I'm sorry" on it.
desc.ko: Rio decided to step down as the president after this incident. Though in great shock, Yuuka could only find a note left by the President, with "I'm sorry" on it.
desc.zh_tw: 莉央在此事後決定卸任會長一職，優香大為震撼。會長走前只留下了一條“對不起”的紙條。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央在此事后决定卸任会长一职，优香大为震撼。会长走前只留下了一条“对不起”的纸条。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉央在此事后决定卸任会长一职，优香大为震撼。会长走前只留下了一条“对不起”的纸条。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央在此事后决定卸任会长一职，优香大为震撼。会长走前只留下了一条“对不起”的纸条。

ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: C&C invited Sensei to the party to celebrate the recovery of the president Neru. Asuna purposed the idea of "Bunny Suit". As the president disappeared, Toki attended the party and became a member of C&C.
desc.jp: C&C invited Sensei to the party to celebrate the recovery of the president Neru. Asuna purposed the idea of "Bunny Suit". As the president disappeared, Toki attended the party and became a member of C&C.
desc.thai: C&C invited Sensei to the party to celebrate the recovery of the president Neru. Asuna purposed the idea of "Bunny Suit". As the president disappeared, Toki attended the party and became a member of C&C.
desc.ko: C&C invited Sensei to the party to celebrate the recovery of the president Neru. Asuna purposed the idea of "Bunny Suit". As the president disappeared, Toki attended the party and became a member of C&C.
desc.zh_tw: C&C邀請了老師前來參加聚會，慶祝部長寧瑠康復出院。明日奈提出了兔女郎裝的主意。季因為會長失蹤，所以也來參加了聚會，併成為C&C的一員。
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C邀请了老师前来参加聚会，庆祝部长尼禄康复出院。明日奈提出了兔女郎装的主意。时因为会长失踪，所以也来参加了聚会，并成为C&C的一员。
desc.zh_cn_tw: C&C邀请了老师前来参加聚会，庆祝部长宁瑠康复出院。明日奈提出了兔女郎装的主意。季因为会长失踪，所以也来参加了聚会，并成为C&C的一员。
desc.zh_cn_cn: C&C邀请了老师前来参加聚会，庆祝部长宁瑠康复出院。明日奈提出了兔女郎装的主意。季因为会长失踪，所以也来参加了聚会，并成为C&C的一员。

realname.zh_cn: 机械迷林(High-Tech Full On Mix)

desc.en: The Engineering Department were developing new stuff as always. Veritas were working closely with Super Phenomenon Task Force. Sumire resumed her daily exercises.
desc.jp: The Engineering Department were developing new stuff as always. Veritas were working closely with Super Phenomenon Task Force. Sumire resumed her daily exercises.
desc.thai: The Engineering Department were developing new stuff as always. Veritas were working closely with Super Phenomenon Task Force. Sumire resumed her daily exercises.
desc.ko: The Engineering Department were developing new stuff as always. Veritas were working closely with Super Phenomenon Task Force. Sumire resumed her daily exercises.
desc.zh_tw: 工程部一如既往的開發著新東西。貝里塔斯和特異現象搜查部一起工作。堇也恢復了日常的鍛鍊。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 工程部一如既往的开发着新东西。贝里塔斯和特异现象搜查部一起工作。堇也恢复了日常的锻炼。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 工程部一如既往的开发着新东西。贝里塔斯和特异现象搜查部一起工作。堇也恢复了日常的锻炼。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 工程部一如既往的开发着新东西。贝里塔斯和特异现象搜查部一起工作。堇也恢复了日常的锻炼。

realname.zh_cn: 机械迷林(High-Tech Full On Mix)

desc.en: Sensei was called by the Game Development Department. The four said they were developing a new games, as they weren't able to come up more ideas for the old one. Aris invited Sensei to try with them, and everyone started the game happily. The story went on and on.
desc.jp: Sensei was called by the Game Development Department. The four said they were developing a new games, as they weren't able to come up more ideas for the old one. Aris invited Sensei to try with them, and everyone started the game happily. The story went on and on.
desc.thai: Sensei was called by the Game Development Department. The four said they were developing a new games, as they weren't able to come up more ideas for the old one. Aris invited Sensei to try with them, and everyone started the game happily. The story went on and on.
desc.ko: Sensei was called by the Game Development Department. The four said they were developing a new games, as they weren't able to come up more ideas for the old one. Aris invited Sensei to try with them, and everyone started the game happily. The story went on and on.
desc.zh_tw: 老師被叫到了遊戲開發部，眾人表示老師正在開發一款新的遊戲，因為之前的那個無法繼續擴充套件思路。愛麗絲邀請老師一起嘗試，眾人在愉快的氛圍下開始了遊戲。故事仍在續寫中。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师被叫到了游戏开发部，众人表示老师正在开发一款新的游戏，因为之前的那个无法继续扩展思路。爱丽丝邀请老师一起尝试，众人在愉快的氛围下开始了游戏。故事仍在续写中。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师被叫到了游戏开发部，众人表示老师正在开发一款新的游戏，因为之前的那个无法继续扩展思路。爱丽丝邀请老师一起尝试，众人在愉快的氛围下开始了游戏。故事仍在续写中。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师被叫到了游戏开发部，众人表示老师正在开发一款新的游戏，因为之前的那个无法继续扩展思路。爱丽丝邀请老师一起尝试，众人在愉快的氛围下开始了游戏。故事仍在续写中。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.thai: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.ko: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。
desc.zh_tw: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.en: [An MV is playing in this part. The BGM was the ending song for the short animation firm "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department. Considering that most images in the videos are actually a part of the in-game backgrounds, therefore we'll be listing as much as backgrounds as we can.]
desc.jp: [An MV is playing in this part. The BGM was the ending song for the short animation firm "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department. Considering that most images in the videos are actually a part of the in-game backgrounds, therefore we'll be listing as much as backgrounds as we can.]
desc.thai: [An MV is playing in this part. The BGM was the ending song for the short animation firm "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department. Considering that most images in the videos are actually a part of the in-game backgrounds, therefore we'll be listing as much as backgrounds as we can.]
desc.ko: [An MV is playing in this part. The BGM was the ending song for the short animation firm "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department. Considering that most images in the videos are actually a part of the in-game backgrounds, therefore we'll be listing as much as backgrounds as we can.]
desc.zh_tw: 【此處為過場影片播放，背景音樂為遊戲部短篇動畫《beautiful day dreamer》的片尾曲。由於影片中的圖片素材大多在遊戲記憶體在，因而背景一欄將盡量給出具體的圖片】
desc.zh_cn_jp: 【此处为过场视频播放，背景音乐为游戏部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》的片尾曲。由于视频中的图片素材大多在游戏内存在，因而背景一栏将尽量给出具体的图片】
desc.zh_cn_tw: 【此处为过场视频播放，背景音乐为游戏部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》的片尾曲。由于视频中的图片素材大多在游戏内存在，因而背景一栏将尽量给出具体的图片】
desc.zh_cn_cn: 【此处为过场视频播放，背景音乐为游戏部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》的片尾曲。由于视频中的图片素材大多在游戏内存在，因而背景一栏将尽量给出具体的图片】

desc.en: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.jp: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.thai: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.ko: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.zh_cn: 官方游戏开发部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》中的片尾曲，由游戏开发部四人演唱。该歌曲由两分钟及四分钟两个版本，其中前者用于动画末尾曲与游戏内第二篇第二章的结尾曲。
desc.zh_tw: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
